name: BenefitsPLUS Media Pvt Ltd.
tag_list: employee-benefits-programs, employee-rewards--recognition, employee-motivation-rewards, loyalty-rewards-program, employee-perks, internet-based-employee-privilege, customer-loyalty, rewards-and-recognition, rr, channel-incentivisation-programs, as-a-compl
overview:
BenefitsPLUS aims to be India’s leading service provider of next generation Marketing, Privilege and Reward Programs. Its proprietary technology connects consumers to retailers and retailers to consumers.

Specialties :

Internet based Employee Privilege, Customer loyalty, Rewards and Recognition (R&R) and Channel incentivisation programs, as a completely managed service.

Ecommerce platform, Business analytics & intelligence, targeted Customer acquisitions and online market segmentation initiatives.
